{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|木|目|ls=ic|t1=tree|t2=eye}} – looking at, or watching the tree.

===Etymology===
An [[allofam]] is {{och-l|胥|each other; mutually; all; to observe; to assist}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

Derivative: {{och-l|想|to think}} (“appearance > to visualise > to think”).

===Etymology 1===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=あい}} stem form of verb {{l|ja|あう}}: to [[meet]], to be [[together]], etc.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あい|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

====Prefix====
{{ja-pos|あい|prefix}}

# [[mutual]], [[together]], [[each other]], [[meet]]ing
#: {{ja-usex|兄弟はいつも'''相'''戦うものだ。|きょうだい は いつも '''あい'''-たたかう もの だ。|Brothers (siblings) will always fight ('''with each other''').}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|あい|suffix}}

# [[mutual]], [[together]], [[each other]], [[meet]]ing

=====Usage notes=====
Generally, {{ja-r|相}} when used as a prefix, {{ja-r|合い}} when used as a suffix.
* {{ja-r|相手|あいて}}: [[partner]], [[opponent]]
* {{ja-r|意味合い|いみあい}}: [[implication]], shade of [[meaning]], [[nuance]]

===Etymology 2===
Originally a compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=こもこも}} elements {{compound|lang=ja|sort=こもこも|此|tr1=ko|t1=this|も|tr2=mo|t2=too|此|tr3=ko|t3=this|も|tr4=mo|t4=too}}. Appears as ''komokomo'' in older texts, evolving into ''komogomo'' in modern Japanese.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|こもごも|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=3|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|こもごも}}, {{l|ja|交交}}, {{l|ja|交}}, {{l|ja|更}}

====Adverb====
{{ja-pos|こもごも|adverb}}

# alternating, one after another
#: {{ja-usex|悲喜'''相'''|ひき '''こもごも'''|sadness and happiness '''one after another''' ⇒ '''mixed''' feelings}}
# all mixed up and indistinct
#: {{ja-usex|'''相'''考える|'''こもごも''' かんがえる|to be '''mixed up''' in one's thoughts, to think '''confusedly'''}}

=====Usage notes=====
Most often seen spelled in hiragana as {{l|ja|こもごも}}. May also be spelled variously as {{l|ja|交交}}, {{l|ja|交}}, {{l|ja|更}}.

===Etymology 3===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さが}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|さが|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====

# {{l|en|nature}}, {{l|en|personality}}
# {{l|en|fate}}, {{l|en|destiny}}

===Etymology 4===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょう}}, deriving from the meaning of {{m|en|with}} from the way that a [[minister]] would always be with their [[lord]]. {{l|ja|sc=Latn|漢音|Kan'on}}, so likely a later borrowing than the ''sō'' reading.

{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|しょう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

#: {{ja-usex|首'''相'''|しゅ'''しょう'''|prime '''minister'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|内'''相'''|ない'''しょう'''|'''minister''' of the interior}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{l|ja|大臣|tr={{l|ja|だいじん}}, ''{{l|ja|sc=Latn|daijin}}''}}
